title: Divers search for U.S., British nationals after yacht sinks off Sicily
content: Tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch and at least two Americans are among the missing after the British-flagged yacht Bayesian sank off the Sicilian coast.
summary: Tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch and at least two Americans are among the missing after the British-flagged yacht Bayesian sank off the Sicilian coast.

title: Israeli military recovers bodies of 6 hostages in Gaza operation
content: The Israel Defense Forces said it recovered the bodies of Yagev Buchshtab, Alexander Dancyg, Avraham Munder, Yoram Metzger, Nadav Popplewell and Haim Perry.
summary: The Israel Defense Forces said it recovered the bodies of Yagev Buchshtab, Alexander Dancyg, Avraham Munder, Yoram Metzger, Nadav Popplewell and Haim Perry.

title: Who is Mike Lynch, the British tech entrepreneur in the superyacht sinking?
content: The software millionaire was once considered the U.K.’s version of Bill Gates. The yacht trip came after his acquittal on U.S. fraud charges related to a 2011 tech deal.
summary: The software millionaire was once considered the U.K.’s version of Bill Gates. The yacht trip came after his acquittal on U.S. fraud charges related to a 2011 tech deal.

title: How Chinese investors tried to take over an Australian mining company
content: A struggle between an Australian mining company and Chinese investors has pulled back a curtain on the intensifying global conflict for rare-earth minerals.
summary: A struggle between an Australian mining company and Chinese investors has pulled back a curtain on the intensifying global conflict for rare-earth minerals.

title: British tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch missing after yacht sinks off Sicily
content: Lynch, his daughter, two other Britons and two Americans were missing after the 183-foot luxury yacht Bayesian sank in a “violent storm.” Fifteen people were rescued; one crew member was found dead.
summary: Lynch, his daughter, two other Britons and two Americans were missing after the 183-foot luxury yacht Bayesian sank in a “violent storm.” Fifteen people were rescued; one crew member was found dead.

title: Mother aboard sinking yacht saves toddler, holding child above water
content: “For two seconds, I lost my baby in the sea,” Charlotte Golunski told local media. She and her daughter, Sophie, were rescued and taken to a nearby hospital.
summary: “For two seconds, I lost my baby in the sea,” Charlotte Golunski told local media. She and her daughter, Sophie, were rescued and taken to a nearby hospital.

title: U.S., Philippines reach deal to assist Afghan allies
content: Hundreds of Afghan refugees will be temporarily relocated to the Philippines as part of a new pathway to U.S. resettlement.
summary: Hundreds of Afghan refugees will be temporarily relocated to the Philippines as part of a new pathway to U.S. resettlement.

title: Why is the U.S. obsessed with sanctions?
content: The United States has imposed economic sanctions on roughly one-third of the countries in the world, with more than 15,000 sanctions currently in effect. Today, why the U.S. has embraced economic sanctions, even though their effectiveness remains open to debate.
summary: The United States has imposed economic sanctions on roughly one-third of the countries in the world, with more than 15,000 sanctions currently in effect. Today, why the U.S. has embraced economic sanctions, even though their effectiveness remains open to debate.

title: Hamas claims Tel Aviv attack as Blinken promotes cease-fire in Israel
content: While the U.S. has said a deal could be concluded as early as this week, the explosion in Tel Aviv underscored the peril of the moment and the risk of escalation.
summary: While the U.S. has said a deal could be concluded as early as this week, the explosion in Tel Aviv underscored the peril of the moment and the risk of escalation.

title: Russia closes in on eastern city despite Ukraine’s successes elsewhere
content: Hopes that Ukraine’s incursion into Russia would relieve pressure on the eastern front are not being realized as Moscow’s forces approach Pokrovsk.
summary: Hopes that Ukraine’s incursion into Russia would relieve pressure on the eastern front are not being realized as Moscow’s forces approach Pokrovsk.

title: Chinese and Philippine ships collide at Sabina Shoal, a new flash point
content: The incident, the first time in decades that Beijing and Manila have clashed over the Sabina Shoal, may derail efforts to lower tensions in the South China Sea.
summary: The incident, the first time in decades that Beijing and Manila have clashed over the Sabina Shoal, may derail efforts to lower tensions in the South China Sea.

title: In Ukraine-controlled Sudzha, stranded Russian civilians question what’s next
content: For Ukrainian forces on the ground, the offensive is seen less as a conquest for long-term annexation and more as a negotiating tactic.
summary: For Ukrainian forces on the ground, the offensive is seen less as a conquest for long-term annexation and more as a negotiating tactic.

title: Blinken arrives in Israel to push cease-fire deal amid doubts of success
content: Secretary of State Antony Blinken is in Israel for a trip focused on bridging the gaps between Israel and Hamas on a U.S.-sponsored cease-fire proposal.
summary: Secretary of State Antony Blinken is in Israel for a trip focused on bridging the gaps between Israel and Hamas on a U.S.-sponsored cease-fire proposal.
